website_summaries.verdict: The slip-on version of the Ever Road walking shoe has impressed a great number of users. They highly recommend this model to those who want a comfortable and light shoe to support them all throughout the day.
pros: A vast majority of purchasers describe it as a very comfortable walking shoe
According to a good number of users, it works excellent for all-day wear and doesn’t cause any discomfort or pain by the end of the day
The shoe’s lightweight construction makes it barely noticeable on the foot, as stated by multiple wearers
The style of the trainer has also been considered as attractive by more than a few people
Several reviews mention that the footwear is very easy to slip on and off
cons: One person warns that the sole tends to be slippery on wet surfaces

customer_reviews.title: I have them in two different colors!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are my absolute favorites!! I have them in navy and black. I’ll be getting white soon. I had 3 surgeries from June to December 2019. I am able to walk comfortably in these shoes. They’re easy to put on once they’re broken in a bit. I’m obsessed. They’re super cute with jeans and shorts. Great for walking the dogs, shopping, etc ! I wear them every day as my casual shoes. Well done Reebok!!!💙💙
customer_reviews.author: CarolinaRN

customer_reviews.title: It's a smidge tight over my instep.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Really light and comfy for walking. I don't have an incredibly high instep and these have a big elastic band that holds the shoe on. In the end, I kind of like the really tight shoe, just be aware that they're snug~
customer_reviews.author: Smartwomn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to have a pair of shoes that I could just slip on to run errands. These are super comfy, fit perfect and are super sporty looking. So happy with this purchase. You should get them!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel R. Gilman

customer_reviews.title: Different than what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Just don't like how the top material is very thin. You can easily see toes wiggling. It doesn't change the feel of the shoe but just not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: soos

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not fo rme
customer_reviews.text: I bought thinking they were like the addidas but when you put them is no tliek a slip on and also is smuches on the heal is weird. I ended up giving to my daughter
customer_reviews.author: Christine perea

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love these! So comfy and easy. No issues so far.. been wearing them for a few weeks now. Fit is true to size
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: Not even a week after getting the the sole of the right foot started to come loose. I only wear them inside to exercise so I don’t understand why that happened. The sneakers aren’t really that supportive either.
customer_reviews.author: T White

customer_reviews.title: New fav shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are sooo comfy and not to mention super cute!! I got the pink in a 6 (I’m a true size 6) and they fit me perfectly! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Cassi Hill

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Feel like I’m walking on marshmallows! I’m a new Mom and these are the easiest things to sleep out to get baby out on a walk. Other neighborhood Mom stopped me and made me send the link of where to get them. I have them in black.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Width
customer_reviews.text: Just disliked if I would of known they were narrow I have wide feet I love the style but just hate that the width doesn’t fit :(
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Trochez

customer_reviews.title: One word-Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd pair I own. They are amazing and comfortable. I have bad feet and these are perfect for foot pain.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Musick

customer_reviews.title: Niceee
customer_reviews.text: So comfy! It’s like walking on clouds! Easy to put on and everything!
customer_reviews.author: Allison C.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Works well to prevent my foot fatigue, while remaining sensitive to bunions.
customer_reviews.author: Lara A

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These seem to have a really good cushion sole. I wore them all day and never once felt any pain or discomfort for a new show.
customer_reviews.author: klsimmons8

customer_reviews.title: Color is very purple It looked more navy on the picture
customer_reviews.text: love the comfort. These shoes are great for whatever activity. They are slip on and might require a shoehorn if it is hard for you to bend down I love these shoes I have purchased 2 other colors I like better
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Reebok womens Ever Road Dmx Slip on
